page.title: 14Education in Cronton
page.content: {Education}There are three Educational establishments within the area, Widnes Sixth Form College,Cronton Church of England Primary School and Holy Family R.C.Primary School.These schools cater for children between the ages of 16+ and 5-11. For education between 11-16 children must travel out of the immediate area. {Sixth Form College}Headteacher Mr.Hoyle no.of staff 35 no.of students 450 school opened 1974. {Cronton C.ofE.Primary}Headteacher Mr.G.Rowley no.of staff 4 no.of children 90 school first established 1930 new buildings 1968 extended 1977. {Holy Family School}Headteacher Miss T.Kenna no.of staff 4 no.of children 92 school first established 1893 new buildings 1972 extended 1979. Secondary education continues in Widnes.
